```{r}
getCleanDataForDate <- function(stationCode, date) {
  year <- as.numeric(format(allDates, format = "%Y"))
  month <- as.numeric(format(allDates, format = "%m"))
  day <- as.numeric(format(allDates, format = "%d"))
  url <- paste0('https://www.wunderground.com/history/airport/',
                stationCode, '/',
                year, '/',
                month, '/',
                day, '/',
                'DailyHistory.html?format=1')
  downloaded_data <- read.csv(url)
  downloaded_data[,'DateUTC.br...'] <- gsub('<br />', '',
                                            as.character(downloaded_data[,'DateUTC.br...']))
}
```
